title: Panama Sells $3 Billion of Bonds in First Deal Under Mulino
description: Panama sold $3 billion of global bonds in its first deal since President Jose Raul Mulino took office almost two years ago, ending a hiatus during which the government had negotiated a series of bank loans.
content: Panama sold $3 billion of global bonds in its first deal since President Jose Raul Mulino took office almost two years ago, ending a hiatus during which the government had negotiated a series of bank loans.
